event: stabbed herself in the abdomen with a kitchen knife
blood pressure could not be measured
wound measuring 5 cm on her upper abdomen
injuries to the common hepatic and splenic arteries
gastroduodenal artery arising from the superior mesenteric artery
patchy mucosal necrosis on the gastric upper body
no evidence of invasive fungal infection
sepsis due to multidrug-resistant Pseudomonas aeruginosa infection
